short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to save links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support you to save what link you usually use. It will be convenient for you to use this app. I want everybody can use this convenient.
Use search to find easily link you want.
Use category to group link.
We will supply share function soon.
